translation.en: [girl 1] Ooh. Since when do we have that horse?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候有那匹马的？

translation.en: -We just got him in. Another rescue. -He's really pretty.
translation.zh:
嗯 我们刚把他带进来 营救来的 -真漂亮呀
-嗯 他很美

translation.en: [girl 2] Yeah, he's beautiful.
translation.zh:
-真漂亮呀
-嗯 他很美

translation.en: -Let's go see what Shelby's up to. -[girl 1] I'll race ya.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们去看看谢尔比在干嘛 比谁先到

translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -Apollo. Who's a good boy?
translation.zh: 阿波罗 谁是乖孩子呀？

translation.en: You are. Yes, you are, Apollo. Who's the best boy?
translation.zh:
你是 是的 你是 阿波罗
你是最乖的孩子

translation.en: Yes, Apollo.
translation.zh: 是的 阿波罗

translation.en: -I love you, Apollo. -[chuckles] Yes, Apollo.
translation.zh: 是的 阿波罗

translation.en: -What's her horse's name again? -Stop.
translation.zh: 她的马叫什么来着？ 别说笑

translation.en: Who's the bestest horsey? You are. Yes, you are.
translation.zh:
谁是最乖的小马呀？
你是 是的 你是

translation.en: Apollo. I love you, Apollo.
translation.zh: 阿波罗 我爱你 阿波罗

translation.en: -Apollo, Apollo. -[neighs]
translation.zh: 阿波罗 阿波罗

translation.en: It's a beautiful horse, though.
translation.zh: 确实是只美丽的马

translation.en: And Shelby's a pretty good rider.
translation.zh: 而且 谢尔比也是个好骑师

translation.en: Well, she'll never be as good as you, Skye.
translation.zh: 她永远也比不上你的 斯凯

translation.en: But she's a lot better than me, of course.
translation.zh: 但当然了 她比我可好多了

translation.en: -You're improving all the time, Olivia. -Thanks.
translation.zh: 你一直在提高呢 奥利维亚 谢谢

translation.en: I only had to get on the saddle twice yesterday.
translation.zh: 我昨天只上了两次马鞍

translation.en: Three times. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 三次

translation.en: ♪ Open up your heart ♪
translation.zh: 敞开心扉

translation.en: ♪ It's time to let it all go ♪
translation.zh: 是时候释怀一切

translation.en: ♪ Share with everyone ♪
translation.zh: 和大家分享

translation.en: ♪ And let your feelings show ♪
translation.zh: 展露你的情感

translation.en: ♪ So come and follow me ♪
translation.zh: 就请你跟我来

translation.en: ♪ Together we'll run free ♪
translation.zh: 我们一起自由奔跑

translation.en: ♪ Friends are family ♪
translation.zh: 朋友就是家人

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna run free ♪
translation.zh: 我们一起自由奔跑

translation.en: Hey, Mum. Hey, Grandpa.
translation.zh:
-嗨 妈妈 嗨 外公
-嗨 姑娘们

translation.en: -Hey, ladies. -We need your help, Skye. You too, Olivia.
translation.zh:
需要你帮忙 斯凯
也需要你 奥利维亚

translation.en: -Oh, yay. Someone needs me. -[horse whinnies]
translation.zh: 耶 有人需要我了

translation.en: [nervous chuckle] You sure you need me?
translation.zh: 你确定要我来吗？

translation.en: -What do we have, Grandpa? -A rescue from a couple counties over.
translation.zh: 这是什么 外公？ 这是隔壁郡那边救援来的

translation.en: The farm was owned by an elderly couple, the Jenkins.
translation.zh:
那个农场是一对老夫妇的
詹金斯夫妇

translation.en: Mr. Jenkins passed away in the winter,
translation.zh: 詹金斯先生冬天去世了

translation.en: and his wife just couldn't keep up with the care of the animals.
translation.zh: 他的妻子没有办法照顾这么多动物

translation.en: -This horse has been neglected for months. -[Skye] Is he gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 这匹小马被忽略了几个月了 他会没事吗？

translation.en: I don't think anybody will be riding him anytime soon.
translation.zh: 我觉得他有一段时间不能被骑了

translation.en: He needs a lot of tender loving care, that's for sure.
translation.zh:
他需要很多的温柔关爱
这是肯定的

translation.en: -What's his name? -Puzzle.
translation.zh:
-他的名字叫什么？
-谜蹄

translation.en: -[Puzzle nickers] -It's okay, Puzzle.
translation.zh: 没事啦 谜蹄

translation.en: Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: -Careful now. -[Puzzle neighs]
translation.zh: 小心点

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Be careful.
translation.zh: 是呢 小心点哦

translation.en: -Easy, boy. -[nickers]
translation.zh: 放松 孩子

translation.en: Where are you putting that horse?
translation.zh: 你们要把那匹马放哪儿？

translation.en: There's an empty stall right next to Apollo. Right, Billy?
translation.zh:
阿波罗旁边正好有个空隔间
对吧 比莉？

translation.en: What? No. You can't put him there.
translation.zh: 什么？不行 你不能把他放那儿

translation.en: Apollo is very sensitive.
translation.zh: 阿波罗很敏感的

translation.en: -He'll be scared. -[Skye] Relax, Shelby.
translation.zh:
-他会被吓到的
-放心啦 谢尔比

translation.en: Olivia was just teasing you.
translation.zh: 奥利维亚只是在逗你玩呢

translation.en: We will put Puzzle at the end stall. Apollo won't even know he's there.
translation.zh:
我们会把谜蹄放在最末尾的隔间的 -阿波罗都不会注意到他在哪的
-这不够远

translation.en: It's not far enough. Apollo won't be happy.
translation.zh:
-阿波罗都不会注意到他在哪的
-这不够远 阿波罗不会高兴的
我很担心阿波罗

translation.en: And I worry about Apollo, especially when I'm not here.
translation.zh:
阿波罗不会高兴的
我很担心阿波罗 尤其是我不在的时候

translation.en: Isn't that right? Don't I worry? Yes, I do worry.
translation.zh:
对吗？我怎么能不担心呢？
是的 我可担心了

translation.en: Apollo, Apollo, Apollo.
translation.zh: 阿波罗 阿波罗 阿波罗

translation.en: You sure you're showing enough affection, Shelby?
translation.zh: 你这样喜爱展示得不够多呀 谢尔比

translation.en: Very funny, Olivia. You're just jealous.
translation.zh:
很好笑 奥利维亚 你只是嫉妒
因为你永远也体验不了 这种强大的

translation.en: Because you will never experience the powerful emotional connection
translation.zh:
你只是嫉妒
因为你永远也体验不了 这种强大的 骑手与自己马之间的情感上的连接

translation.en: that one forges when one has one's very own horse.
translation.zh: 骑手与自己马之间的情感上的连接

translation.en: -That just sounds weird. -[clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 好吧 这话说的...

translation.en: -Olivia, could you grab my bag? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 可以帮我拿包吗？ 遵命 先生

translation.en: [Grandpa] Never a dull moment.
translation.zh: 总不缺有趣的瞬间

translation.en: Ethan makes his way down the field with only a goat between him and victory.
translation.zh: 伊森踏上球场 他与胜利之间只有一头羊

translation.en: He cuts the corner. He shoots.
translation.zh: 他盘球过人 他射门 球进啦！

translation.en: And he scores.
translation.zh: 他射门 球进啦！

translation.en: Good game, Gary.
translation.zh: 踢得不错 盖瑞

translation.en: Gary, looks like they need some help.
translation.zh: 盖瑞 看上去他们要人帮忙

translation.en: -Oh, hi, Ethan. -Oh, hi.
translation.zh:
-噢 嗨 伊森
-噢 嗨

translation.en: Wait, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 等等 你在干什么？

translation.en: I wanna see if you've got new drawings. I love your drawings.
translation.zh:
我只是想看看你有没画什么新画
我可喜欢你画的画了

translation.en: -You do? -Yeah. They're really good.
translation.zh:
-你喜欢？
-是的 画得都很好

translation.en: Oh, thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [gasps] Look at this. Who is this?
translation.zh: 看看这个 这是谁？

translation.en: -That's Gary, the goat. -[horse whinnying]
translation.zh: 那是盖瑞 那头羊

translation.en: -What are you doing? -[clicks]
translation.zh: 现在你又在干嘛？

translation.en: I'll put Gary on my KidFriend page.
translation.zh: 我要把小羊盖瑞放到我们小朋友圈上

translation.en: Well, my mum will. She uploads everything.
translation.zh: 好吧 我妈妈妈会弄的 她什么都传

translation.en: I don't really do that social media stuff.
translation.zh: 我不太弄社交媒体那一套

translation.en: It's a cool way to share all my photos. You should share your drawings.
translation.zh: 用来分享我的照片很好用 你应该分享些你的画

translation.en: My mum can set up a page for your parents.
translation.zh: 我妈妈可以帮你父母弄一个页面

translation.en: That's a very generous offer, but, no thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢你大方的提议 但是不用了

translation.en: I came here to get some animal time. We'll discuss it later.
translation.zh:
好吧 我来是为了来陪陪动物的
我们晚点再讨论咯

translation.en: I don't need to discuss it.
translation.zh: 这个不需要讨论啦

translation.en: Hey, Gary.
translation.zh: 嗨 盖瑞

translation.en: -[nickers] -There you go. There you go.
translation.zh: 就这样 就这样

translation.en: His heart rate's elevated, but that's expected.
translation.zh: 他的心跳有点快 但这是想象之中的

translation.en: We'll get him cleaned up, take care of the abrasions.
translation.zh: 如果我们帮他弄干净并治好擦伤

translation.en: Get him dewormed, get him over to the farrier.
translation.zh: 给他除了虫 让他去见下兽医

translation.en: Get some good food into him. That's gonna change a lot.
translation.zh: 再喂他点好食物 会有很多改变的

translation.en: But is he gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 他会没事吗？

translation.en: Oh, physically, he's gonna be just fine.
translation.zh: 生理上 他会没事的

translation.en: -[Puzzle neighs, snorts] -That's good. [Olivia] Yay.
translation.zh:
-那很好
-耶

translation.en: Well, he's been through a lot.
translation.zh: 哇 他经历了很多

translation.en: He hasn't had a lot of human contact.
translation.zh: 他没怎么跟人类的接触过

translation.en: It'll take a while to get back to normal.
translation.zh: 让他回到正常需要花上点时间

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们会想出办法的

translation.en: -[Puzzle snorts] -[chuckles] I like that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这说法

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Figure it out. Just like a real puzzle.
translation.zh: 想出办法 就像一个真的谜题一样

translation.en: [Grandpa] Like I said, it's gonna take some time.
translation.zh: 如我说的 亲爱的 需要花上点时间

translation.en: -[nickers] -We'll give him all the time he needs.
translation.zh: 我们会给他所有他需要的时间

translation.en: [Billy sighs] It's great you're committed
translation.zh: 你这么投入真好 斯凯

translation.en: but you can't spend all your free time with Puzzle.
translation.zh: 但你不能把所有的空余时间都给谜蹄

translation.en: -Why not? I wanna do it. -I know.
translation.zh: 为什么不行？我想这么做

translation.en: But you have to keep up with your schoolwork.
translation.zh: 我明白 但你学习要顾牢 甜心

translation.en: With dyslexia, you have to work extra hard.
translation.zh: 有读写困难症 你需要额外努力

translation.en: I am working extra hard.
translation.zh: 我已经额外努力了

translation.en: Well, apparently, you didn't do so well on your English test today.
translation.zh: 看上去 你今天的英语考得不怎么样

translation.en: But-- How did you know that?
translation.zh: 但是... 你是怎么知道的？

translation.en: Aha! I'll bet Shelby told you.
translation.zh: 我打赌是谢尔比告诉你的

translation.en: No, no, no. It wasn't Shelby.
translation.zh: 不不不 不是谢尔比说的

translation.en: Your teacher, Miss Fenton, she called me. And she wants to help.
translation.zh: 你的老师 芬顿女士 她打给我的 而且 她想要提供帮助

translation.en: -I was gonna tell you. -That's okay, honey.
translation.zh: 我本来要告诉你的 没事的 甜心 但芬顿女士还告诉我

translation.en: But Miss Fenton also told me that
translation.zh: 没事的 甜心 但芬顿女士还告诉我

translation.en: when it came time for you to read in class, you pretended you were sick.
translation.zh:
每当轮到你上台去阅读
你就会假装你生病了

translation.en: I, I was sick.
translation.zh: 我真的生病了

translation.en: Okay, I wasn't sick.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没有生病

translation.en: You know I hate reading in front of the class, in front of anybody.
translation.zh: 你知道的 我很讨厌在全班面前阅读 在任何人面前

translation.en: I get so nervous, and all the words get even more mixed up.
translation.zh:
我会很紧张
所有的词就更混在一起了

translation.en: I know it's not easy, honey. And-- [inhales]
translation.zh: 我知道这不容易 甜心

translation.en: You know, it'll never be easy. But if you keep trying, I promise you, you will get better.
translation.zh:
永远不会容易的 但如果你一直努力
我向你保证 你会变好的

translation.en: -Okay. I promise I won't stop trying. -Aha! That's the spirit.
translation.zh: 好的 我想你保证我不会停止努力 这样就对了

translation.en: That's how you learned to ride, remember?
translation.zh:
嘿 你小时候就是这样学骑马的
记得吗？

translation.en: You'd fall off your horse, your horse wouldn't take commands.
translation.zh:
你原来经常从马上掉下来
马还不肯听你的命令

translation.en: But you just never quit trying.
translation.zh: 但是 你从未停止努力

translation.en: And, now, you're an amazing rider.
translation.zh: 而现在... 你是个超棒的骑师

translation.en: I promise I'll do better in school.
translation.zh: 我保证我在学校的表现会更好的

translation.en: And I'll do all my homework.
translation.zh: 而且我会做完我的作业

translation.en: I just think that Puzzle is special.
translation.zh: 我只是想... 谜蹄不一般

translation.en: And I know I can help him.
translation.zh: 而我知道我能帮助他

translation.en: I'm sure you can, honey. You help all the animals around here.
translation.zh: 我相信你可以的 甜心 你在帮这里所有的动物

translation.en: -You really have a gift. -Thanks, Mum.
translation.zh: 你真的很有天赋 谢谢 妈妈

translation.en: I do not know what we would do without you here. And Olivia. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不知道这儿没了你我们要怎么办 还有奥利维亚 所有那些志愿者们

translation.en: And all the volunteers.
translation.zh: 还有奥利维亚 所有那些志愿者们

translation.en: Thank goodness we have a vet in the family.
translation.zh: 还有 谢天谢地我们家里有个兽医

translation.en: I've been retired for two years now. Apparently your mum did not get the memo.
translation.zh: 我已经退休两年了 但是 看起来 你妈妈还不知道

translation.en: Hey, fundraising has been a little tight lately, that's all.
translation.zh: 嘿 筹款活动最近有些紧 只是

translation.en: At the moment, the only income we have is from boarding the horses like Apollo.
translation.zh:
目前 我们唯一的经济来源是给
像阿波罗这样的马寄宿

translation.en: Your mum's right. If we wanna keep Rescue Ranch going,
translation.zh: 妈妈说的对 如果我们想要让救援农场继续下去

translation.en: we've gotta work on finding homes for all the animals.
translation.zh: 如果我们想要让救援农场继续下去 我们需要给所有的动物找到家

translation.en: And about Puzzle...
translation.zh:
-还有关于谜蹄
-我明白

translation.en: I know. Don't get too attached.
translation.zh:
-还有关于谜蹄
-我明白 -别建立太深的感情
-如果你能做到的话 好吗

translation.en: If you can help it, okay?
translation.zh:
-别建立太深的感情
-如果你能做到的话 好吗

translation.en: After supper, I can help you with your homework, Skye.
translation.zh:
晚饭以后 如果你需要的话
我可以帮你一起做作业 斯凯

translation.en: Thanks, Olivia.
translation.zh: 谢谢 奥利维亚

translation.en: Only for an hour, okay? Then Grandpa will drive Olivia home.
translation.zh: 好吧 但就一小时 好吗？ 然后外公送奥利维亚回家

translation.en: Okay, Skye. Let's show your mum we can do this.
translation.zh:
好的 斯凯 -让我们证明给你妈妈看 我们能行
-嗯

translation.en: Yeah. And I can do my homework outside, too.
translation.zh:
-让我们证明给你妈妈看 我们能行
-嗯 而且我也可以在室外做作业

translation.en: ♪ Walking by, going different ways ♪
translation.zh: 不同的路一起走

translation.en: ♪ Had so many things to share ♪
translation.zh: 有那么多事要分享

translation.en: ♪ We decided we're a perfect pair ♪
translation.zh: 我们决定了我们是完美的一对

translation.en: ♪ When we're together ♪
translation.zh: 当我们在一起

translation.en: ♪ Everything's alright ♪
translation.zh: 一切都没问题

translation.en: ♪ Birds of a feather ♪
translation.zh: 我们是一类人

translation.en: "...was a very cold one.
translation.zh: ...好冷

translation.en: And one night..."
translation.zh: 一个夜晚...

translation.en: Act like you're presenting.
translation.zh: 像你在演讲一样读

translation.en: -♪ Way up in the sky ♪ -"And one night..."
translation.zh: 一个夜晚...

translation.en: ♪ We're watching the clouds drift by Together forever ♪
translation.zh: 我们看着云朵飘过 永远在一起

translation.en: ♪ Just you and I ♪
translation.zh: 只有我和你

translation.en: -♪ Just you and I ♪ -[bleats]
translation.zh: 只有我和你

translation.en: Let's go. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Easy, easy.
translation.zh: 放松 放松

translation.en: -Easy. Yeah, that's it. -[snorts]
translation.zh: 发送 嗯 就这样

translation.en: [Olivia] She's gonna do it.
translation.zh: 她要骑了

translation.en: -She's getting on. -That's my girl.
translation.zh:
-她骑上去了
-这就是我的好孩子

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Easy, Puzzle.
translation.zh: 放松 谜蹄

translation.en: -[Puzzle whinnies, snorts] -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的 没事的

translation.en: -[Olivia] Yay! -[shushing]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-嗨

translation.en: -John? Hi, I'm Billy. -Yes. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-约翰？
-嗯？ 很高兴认识你

translation.en: This is the ranch, and that's where the horses are. Yeah, so...
translation.zh: 这就是农场

translation.en: -[Billy] We got a deal? -[John] Yes.
translation.zh:
-成交了吗？
-是的

translation.en: -Great. Fun doing business with you. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-太好了
-多谢你

translation.en: Oh, honey, well done.
translation.zh: 噢 甜心 干得好

translation.en: -Way to go, kid. -Thanks, Mum. Thanks, Grandpa.
translation.zh:
-做得好 孩子们
-谢谢 妈妈 谢谢 外公

translation.en: I didn't think you'd be riding him for weeks.
translation.zh: 我没想到你会骑几个星期的谜蹄

translation.en: [Skye] Yeah. He's really coming around.
translation.zh: 是呀 他真的很适应了

translation.en: -Who was that man you were talking to? -Oh, that was Mr. Simpson.
translation.zh:
那个你在说话的人是谁？ 哦 那是辛普森先生
他刚买了老艾弗里农场

translation.en: -He bought the Everly Ranch. -Yep.
translation.zh:
哦 那是辛普森先生
他刚买了老艾弗里农场

translation.en: -What did he want? -He just came to check out the operation.
translation.zh:
他来这干嘛？ 他过来看看日常工作
他想要给他的孙儿们买匹小马

translation.en: He wants to buy a pony for his grandkids.
translation.zh:
他过来看看日常工作
他想要给他的孙儿们买匹小马

translation.en: And you said he could have Puzzle.
translation.zh: 然后你说了他应该要谜蹄

translation.en: Skye, we haven't agreed on anything yet.
translation.zh: 斯凯 我们还没有都谈好

translation.en: But... [inhales] ...this could be a good situation for Puzzle and for all of us.
translation.zh: 但是 这对谜蹄和我们都很好

translation.en: Look, Skye, I know you love Puzzle, and...
translation.zh: 听着 斯凯 我知道你爱谜蹄...

translation.en: I know you'd be a wonderful owner. Right? But this is a rescue ranch.
translation.zh:
我知道你会做一个很棒的主人
但是... 这是个救援农场

translation.en: We take in horses and ponies that need our help,
translation.zh: 我们收留需要帮助的马和小马驹

translation.en: and we work with them, physically and emotionally, and we heal them.
translation.zh:
我们在生理上心理上照顾他们
我们治好他们

translation.en: We come to understand them.
translation.zh: 我们理解他们

translation.en: Through that understanding, we find them a perfect home
translation.zh:
然后我们通过这理解
给他们找一个完美的新家

translation.en: where we know that their owner and that animal is very happy.
translation.zh: 主人和动物都非常开心的新家

translation.en: That's where our success comes, when we find that perfect match.
translation.zh: 这是我们要做的事情 当我们找到主人和马的完美配对

translation.en: That allows us room to bring in new animals that need our help.
translation.zh:
然后这猜让我们能收留
更多需要我们帮助的新动物

translation.en: If we keep our rescues, Skye, we fail,
translation.zh:
如果我们留下我们的救援对象
斯凯 我们就失败了

translation.en: because we don't have the time or the energy to help new animals that need us.
translation.zh:
因为我们不会有时间和能量
来帮助那些需要我们的新动物

translation.en: How could you?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么做？

translation.en: [Billy] Skye.
translation.zh: 斯凯

translation.en: Skye!
translation.zh: 斯凯

translation.en: Let her be. She'll be fine. -[Olivia] Skye! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 让她自己呆一会儿 她会没事的

translation.en: -[snorts] -[Olivia] You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: We've done everything we said we would.
translation.zh: 我们已经做完了我们承诺的了

translation.en: You're helping me with reading, I'm doing all my homework.
translation.zh: 你在帮我阅读 我做完了所有的作业

translation.en: -I haven't been sick for any tests. -I know.
translation.zh:
每次考试我都没生病 我知道
而且我们在尽全力为农场工作

translation.en: And we're working as hard as ever on the ranch.
translation.zh:
我知道
而且我们在尽全力为农场工作

translation.en: So why would she wanna give him to some stranger?
translation.zh: 那她为什么想要把他送给陌生人？

translation.en: I don't think she wants to.
translation.zh: 我不认为她是想

translation.en: Rescuing means finding new homes for animals, making new space for animals.
translation.zh:
救援意味着为动物们寻找新家
给新动物留出空间

translation.en: It's way too expensive to keep them all.
translation.zh: 要收留全部太贵了

translation.en: We have to do something.
translation.zh: 我们必须做点什么

translation.en: What more can we do? There are only two of us.
translation.zh: 我们还能做什么？ 只有我们俩

translation.en: What do you mean, only two?
translation.zh: 只有我们俩什么意思？

translation.en: What do you mean "what do you mean"?
translation.zh: 你的什么意思是什么意思？

translation.en: -I mean, I count you two-- -One, two.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 我数了你们两个 一 二

translation.en: [scoffs] Thank you, Ethan.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 伊森

translation.en: And I count us two.
translation.zh: 我还数了我们

translation.en: Three, four.
translation.zh: 三 四

translation.en: -You mean, you wanna help? -[girl] Of course, Skye.
translation.zh:
你的意思是你想要帮忙？ 当然 斯凯 我们爱动物和农场
爱得和你们一样多

translation.en: We love the animals and the ranch as much as you guys do.
translation.zh:
当然 斯凯 我们爱动物和农场
爱得和你们一样多

translation.en: And we don't wanna see Puzzle go anywhere.
translation.zh: 我们不想见到谜蹄离开

translation.en: [girl] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是的
-斯凯

translation.en: Skye, if we have four of us instead of just two of us,
translation.zh:
-是的
-斯凯 如果我们有四个
那我们就有两倍的人了

translation.en: it's like twice as many people.
translation.zh:
如果我们有四个
那我们就有两倍的人了

translation.en: We can get twice as much accomplished.
translation.zh: 我们可以做成两倍的事

translation.en: More than twice as much if we work together.
translation.zh: 超过两倍 如果我们一起合作的话

translation.en: -Exactly. -[Skye] Like you and me, Olivia.
translation.zh:
-说得对
-就像你和我 奥利维亚

translation.en: You help me with reading, I help you with riding.
translation.zh: 你帮我练阅读 我帮你学骑马

translation.en: -We all have our strengths. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们各自有强项

translation.en: You're really smart and funny.
translation.zh:
-对
-你很聪明 而且很搞笑

translation.en: And you're a great reader and writer.
translation.zh: 你还是个很好的领袖和作家

translation.en: And you know stuff.
translation.zh: 而且你知道很多

translation.en: And stuff you don't know, you can research.
translation.zh: 而你不知道的 你会去研究

translation.en: -Yeah, I can do that. [chuckles] -[girl] Exactly.
translation.zh:
是的 我是能做到 说得对
而且伊森是个难以置信的艺术家

translation.en: And Ethan is an unbelievable artist.
translation.zh:
说得对
而且伊森是个难以置信的艺术家

translation.en: But he's so shy, he hardly ever talks.
translation.zh: 但 他太害羞了 他都不说话

translation.en: [exhales] I talk, but...
translation.zh: 我说话的 但是...

translation.en: [girl] I'm great with design and photography.
translation.zh: 我在设计和拍照上很擅长

translation.en: We could have our own KidFriend page, to raise awareness.
translation.zh:
我们可以弄个自己的小朋友圈页面
来加强大家的认识

translation.en: I'll ask my mum to set it up.
translation.zh:
-我会让我妈妈去设置一个
-然后办点筹款？

translation.en: -And do some fundraising? -[girl] Exactly.
translation.zh:
-我会让我妈妈去设置一个
-然后办点筹款？ 完全对

translation.en: -A fun KidFriend page for fundraising. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-一个有趣的小朋友圈页面来筹款
-是的

translation.en: -We'll be like a superheroes club. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们会像是 超级英雄俱乐部 对

translation.en: Only we're not superheroes, we're just kids. But we can be a club.
translation.zh:
只不过我们不是超级英雄
我们只是小孩 但是 我们可以成立个俱乐部...

translation.en: the Ponysitters Club.
translation.zh: 小马保姆俱乐部

translation.en: -Great idea. -Awesome.
translation.zh:
-好主意
-太棒了！

translation.en: We have more than just ponies, though. Dogs, cats, donkeys, and ducks.
translation.zh: 不过我们不止有小马 狗 猫 驴 还有鸭

translation.en: And bunnies.
translation.zh: 还有小兔

translation.en: -See how we believe in caring? -We like Gary the Goat, too.
translation.zh: 看到我们多相信关怀了？ 而且我们耶很喜欢小羊盖瑞

translation.en: And Skye is the most empathetic person I know.
translation.zh: 而且斯凯是我认识的最有同情心的人

translation.en: She always identifies with how others feel.
translation.zh: 她总是能理解别人的感受

translation.en: And we're all very helpful every day.
translation.zh: 我们每天都很乐于帮助

translation.en: Okay. The hard part is,
translation.zh: 好 难的部分是...

translation.en: is gonna be convincing my mum this is all gonna work.
translation.zh: 是要说服我妈 这一切都可行

translation.en: We have to do it soon if we wanna keep Puzzle.
translation.zh:
而且我们必须尽快
如果想要留住谜蹄的话

translation.en: And, if we wanna rescue other horses.
translation.zh: 而且如果我们想要救援其他的马

translation.en: Two words. Digital presentation.
translation.zh: 五个字：数字存在感

translation.en: Great idea, Trish.
translation.zh: 好主意 崔西

translation.en: Do you think we can pull that all together by tonight?
translation.zh:
但是 你认为我们
今晚之前就能做好吗？

translation.en: Definitely. We'll pitch like executives.
translation.zh: 绝对的 我们会像总裁那样推介的

translation.en: Oh, and shoot videos of the horses.
translation.zh: 噢 还要和马拍个视频

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Skye] Let's get to work.
translation.zh: 我们开始工作吧

translation.en: That wraps up the digital finishing touches.
translation.zh: 我想我们做完了所有的修图了

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 而且...

translation.en: we're live on our KidFriend page.
translation.zh: 我们的小朋友圈页面上线了

translation.en: [both] Celebratory dance.
translation.zh: 庆祝舞蹈

translation.en: -I hear you're doing a presentation. -Yes?
translation.zh: 我听说你们在做一个展示？ 嗯？

translation.en: You might need higher quality photos for your presentation.
translation.zh: 我以为你们会需要一些高质量的图片

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 噢

translation.en: Thanks, Shelby. It's just...
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢尔比 只是...

translation.en: this is about rescue animals, not show ponies.
translation.zh:
这是关于救援动物的
不是展示小马

translation.en: No offence. They're really nice photos.
translation.zh: 别被冒犯 这些照片很好

translation.en: I just thought Apollo would be a good role model for those other ponies.
translation.zh:
我只是想
阿波罗可以为其他的小马做榜样

translation.en: Is this what non-horse owners do to waste their time?
translation.zh:
这就是非马主人做的
来浪费时间的事？

translation.en: Who needs the Ponysitters Club when you can be in the Ponyowner's club?
translation.zh:
谁需要小马保姆俱乐部
当你可以加入小马主人俱乐部？

translation.en: -[nickering] -[Shelby] Apollo.
translation.zh: 阿波罗

translation.en: There you are. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你在这儿 你还好吗？

translation.en: I was so worried with you being here with that new horse.
translation.zh: 我们担心你和那匹新马在一起

translation.en: A well-bred horse like you shouldn't be near a creature like that.
translation.zh:
像你这样的一个血统纯正的马
不应该和那样的生物在一起

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Don't worry. I'll fix it for you.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会帮你搞定的

translation.en: You're not a boarder, so you don't deserve a stall.
translation.zh:
你不是来被寄养的
所以你不该住隔间

translation.en: You need to live in the back paddock, where you belong.
translation.zh:
你需要住在一个后院围场里
那才是你属于的地方

translation.en: So this is our brand new web page.
translation.zh: 这是我们的全新网页

translation.en: We set up a link for donations.
translation.zh: 我们设置了一个捐款链接

translation.en: We wanted to talk about selling yearly sponsorships to the ranch
translation.zh: 我们想要卖农场年度的赞助权

translation.en: and do monthly family tours.
translation.zh: 然后做每月的家庭导游

translation.en: -[Billy] My goodness! -Good idea.
translation.zh:
-我的天
-那是个好主意

translation.en: So, to wrap it all up, I'd like to re-introduce the members of the club.
translation.zh:
所以 总结一下
我想要重新介绍下俱乐部成员

translation.en: Olivia. Academic extraordinaire, literacy tutor,
translation.zh: 奥利维加 卓越学者 写作导师 首席作家和调研员

translation.en: and head writer and researcher.
translation.zh: 写作导师 首席作家和调研员

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -Trish. Media expert, a designer with real flair, social convener,
translation.zh:
崔西 媒体专家 有才的设计师
社交召集人

translation.en: -and somebody who likes to talk a lot. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 而且是个很喜欢说话的人

translation.en: Ethan, an incredible artist. A sensitive type that doesn't say much.
translation.zh:
伊森 难以置信的艺术家 敏感的类型
不爱说话

translation.en: I talk.
translation.zh: 我说话的

translation.en: And, finally, me. Animal expert, I'm told.
translation.zh: 最后 我 动物专家 他们这么说的

translation.en: Riding tutor. And, apparently, the president of the Ponysitters Club.
translation.zh:
骑马导师
而且还是小马保姆俱乐部的主席

translation.en: I didn't ask for it.
translation.zh: 可不是我要求的

translation.en: So, members...
translation.zh: 所以 成员们？

translation.en: Ponysitters Club.
translation.zh: 小马保姆俱乐部

translation.en: -We stand up for... -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们代表着...

translation.en: -[Skye] Caring. -Kindness.
translation.zh:
-关怀
-善良

translation.en: -Empathy. -And helping.
translation.zh:
-同理心
-还有助人

translation.en: -[in unison] Yeah! -Wow.
translation.zh: 耶！ 哇

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Well done.
translation.zh: 干得好

translation.en: -[horse neighing in the distance] -What was that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Oh, no. Puzzle.
translation.zh: 不好了 谜蹄

translation.en: What is Puzzle doing in the back paddock?
translation.zh: 谜蹄怎么会在后院围场？

translation.en: I don't know. He was supposed to be in a stall for rehabilitation.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他应该在他的隔间里疗养的

translation.en: Um, Olivia, grab his tether. Uh, Trish, his blanket.
translation.zh:
奥利维亚 去拿他的缰绳 崔西他的披巾 伊森去拿牧草和苹果
来诱导他

translation.en: -Ethan, some hay, apples to tempt him. -Good idea.
translation.zh:
崔西他的披巾 伊森去拿牧草和苹果
来诱导他 好主意

translation.en: -[Puzzle neighs] -Whoa. Let her go. She's got this.
translation.zh: 让她去 她能做到的

translation.en: [Grandpa] She's gonna do just fine. She's had the most contact with him.
translation.zh: 她肯定没问题 她和他相处得最多

translation.en: -It's okay. You're safe. -[nickers]
translation.zh: 没问题的 你很安全

translation.en: I'm so relieved Puzzle's back in his stall.
translation.zh: 谜蹄回到隔间里 我真是松了一口气

translation.en: So, that was the Ponysitters' first official activity.
translation.zh:
刚才那是小马保姆俱乐部的第一件
正式活动

translation.en: -What do you say, Mum? -I think the presentation was impressive.
translation.zh: 你觉得怎样 妈妈？ 我认为展示非常的好

translation.en: Thanks, Grandpa.
translation.zh: 谢谢 外公

translation.en: Skye, all of you... [hisses]
translation.zh: 斯凯 你们所有人

translation.en: What can I say? Yes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我还能说什么呢？我同意

translation.en: Oh, wait. Don't go anywhere.
translation.zh: 哦等等 哪也别去

translation.en: We are not quite finished yet.
translation.zh: 我们其实还没完成

translation.en: We are going to end off the presentation with...
translation.zh: 我们要以一点...

translation.en: a little reading.
translation.zh: 阅读来完成这次的展示

translation.en: I wanted to read the end of Doctor Dolittle
translation.zh: 我只是想读《杜立德医生》的结尾

translation.en: that I've been practising for school.
translation.zh: 我在为学校练习的这个

translation.en: "And so it was, with all the odd other animals that were brought to him.
translation.zh: “于是和所有这些带给他的奇怪动物

translation.en: As soon as they found that he could talk their language, they talked.
translation.zh:
他们一发现他懂得他们的语言
他们就互相说话了

translation.en: Told him where the pain was and how they felt,
translation.zh:
告诉他他们的病痛在哪
他们的感觉怎样

translation.en: and, of course, it was easy for him to cure them."
translation.zh:
当然 这就让他治疗他们
变得容易多了”

translation.en: Good job.
translation.zh: 干得好

translation.en: I'm so proud of you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我真为你感到自豪

translation.en: Thanks, Mum.
translation.zh: 谢谢 妈妈

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Me, too. [Billy] Come on in. Everybody.
translation.zh:
-我也是
-都来吧 大家

translation.en: -Hmm. -Ponysitters! -[all] Ponysitters! -Yeah!
translation.zh:
-小马保姆
-耶！
